  • Constructor Details

    • AutoModAction

      public AutoModAction (@NotNull @NotNull String actionString)
      Constructs a new AutoModAction object by parsing the given action string. The action string should be in the format "actionType!actionLimit:parameter1=value1:parameter2=value2:...".
      Parameters:
      actionString - the string representation of the auto moderation action
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the actionString is null

  • Method Details

    • parseActions

      public static AutoModAction @NotNull [] parseActions (@NotNull @NotNull String actionsString)
      Parses a string representation of auto moderation actions and returns an array of AutoModAction objects.
      Parameters:
      actionsString - the string representation of the auto moderation actions
      Returns:
      the array of AutoModAction objects parsed from the actionsString
